text: The Bahamas competed at the 1976 Summer Olympics in Montreal, Quebec, Canada. It was the first time it competed in the Olympics as an independent nation. ==Athletics== ;Men ;Track & road events {| class="wikitable" style="font- size:90%" |- !rowspan="2"|Athlete
